thread.title: Watch This Driver Avoid Crashing After Insane 160 MPH Spin On The Nürburgring
thread.title_full: Watch This Driver Avoid Crashing After Insane 160 MPH Spin On The Nürburgring

author: Stef Schrader on Black Flag, shared by Alanis King to Jalopnik
title: Watch This Driver Avoid Crashing After Insane 160 MPH Spin On The Nürburgring
text:
GIF via Donut Media 
Say it with me now: nope nope nope nope nope nope nope... 
This Porsche Cayman GT4 Clubsport driver had the insane ride of his life after losing control at 160 mph on one of the most unforgiving tracks on Earth: the Nürburgring Nordschleife. Advertisement 
Somehow, someway he manages to keep the spinning top of a Porsche out of the walls. Phew. Code Brown: Defcon 9001
